holidays.title: International Lefthanders Day
holidays.description: Wonder what it's like to see the world from a "left-handed" point of view?

holidays.title: Gay Uncles Day
holidays.description: Pull out your photos with your gay relatives and get ready to celebrate them!

holidays.title: Melon Day
holidays.description: Melon Day celebrates cantaloupes, galias, all muskmelons, and, most importantly, the Turkmenbashi melon.

holidays.title: National Filet Mignon Day
holidays.description: Devour a tender filet mignon steak in order to pay tribute to this day!

holidays.title: National Prosecco Day
holidays.description: Whether throwing a party with friends or hitting a festival, Prosecco will lighten any mood.

holidays.title: Obon Festival
holidays.description: Prepare to rekindle lost connections with your ancestors during one of the biggest festivals in Japan.

holidays.title: The Day of Cantabria
holidays.description: Learn more about Cantabria and make this beautiful region with its rich history your next holiday destination.

holidays.title: Women's and Family Day
holidays.description: Call your mother, sister, or daughter and greet them with a happy Women’s and Family Day!

holidays.title: Amber Scholl’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this creative YouTuber, irrevocable fame and success are one post away.

holidays.title: Jaemin’s Birthday
holidays.description: This Korean rapper, actor, singer, and dancer’s journey has only just begun.

holidays.title: Kendu Isaacs’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this talented music manager, his legacy will live on in sound.

holidays.title: Sebastian Stan’s Birthday
holidays.description: The talented actor was not always the bonafide personality he is today.

holidays.title: Tiffany Moon’s Birthday
holidays.description: Ever wondered what this budding star gets up to? We have the insights.

holidays.title: ZacharyZaxor’s Birthday
holidays.description: ZacharyZaxor has become well-known for his comedy impersonation, wit, and entertaining abilities.
